attributes.action: Make Land of Hope & Glory the National Anthem replacing God Save the Queen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst I am a monarchist I think that the current National Anthem is very drab.Land Of Hope & Glory is a rousing tune that encourages people to sing & be proud of our great nation

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
